weight: Approx. 289 g (including battery and memory card)
focallength: Main: 5.2 – 26.0 mm (35 mm equivalent: 24 – 120 mm) Rear: (35mm equivalent: 25mm)
zoom: Main: Optical 5x ZoomPlus 10x Digital Approx. 4.0x (with Digital Tele-Converter Approx. 1.5x or 2.0x). Combined Approx. 20x¹
